HOME.heading: Welcome, Pioneer
paragraphs: Monitor the pulse of your ecosystem, from orbital relays to subterranean labs.
Deploy new modules, triage anomalies, and keep the signal flowing across every colony node.
Your dashboard updates live as each subsystem reports in.
HOME.statusMessage: Initiating Colony hub bootstrap... telemetry link pending.

MISSIONS.heading: Mission Control
paragraphs: Curate expeditions for survey crews and autonomous drones.
Review intel, assign specialists, and sync their loadouts before departure.
Adaptive routing keeps teams supplied as they cross hostile biomes.
MISSIONS.statusMessage: Next mission packet staged for uplink. Awaiting confirmation.

DATABASE.heading: Knowledge Vault
paragraphs: Archive genomes, trade manifests, and decoded beacon reports.
Link fragments together to map trade routes and culture exchanges.
Pattern matching surfaces anomalies before they reach the frontier.
DATABASE.statusMessage: Archival node reserved. Begin artifact ingestion sequence.

SETTINGS.heading: Systems Configuration
paragraphs: Tune failover thresholds, diagnostics cadence, and access protocols.
Harden comms relays, rotate keys, and route maintenance drones proactively.
Export hardened configs to staging before syncing the fleet.
SETTINGS.statusMessage: Configuration diff compiled. Ready for distributed rollout.
